attributes.action: Legally let students leave if their teacher is 10 minutes late
attributes.additional_details: So that students don’t waste their time waiting outside of a classroom and so that they can learn
attributes.background: Let any uk students whether it is college or university leave their class if the teacher hasn’t arrived within the first 15 minutes and there isn’t a substitute

rejection.details:
We can only accept petitions about things the Government or Parliament are directly responsible for.

Decisions about school timetables are a matter for individual schools, not the UK Government or Parliament.
